name: We Multiply
description:
My submission to the Minimalist Game Jam #1.

Inspired by Geometry Wars' Pacifism game mode. Run away from red enemy circles. Run into x1, x2, or x3s to create an explosion that can kill the red enemies. You earn 1, 2, or 3 points per enemy killed by running into the x1, x2, or x3 respectively. Try to beat your high score!
